name: Dai-4-Ji Super Robot Taisen S
overview: Super Robot Wars 4 Scramble (aka Dai 4 Ji Super Robot Taisen): The first SRW to feature an Original Character protagonist, along with separate Real and Super paths. First SRW to feature items that can be equipped to a unit to improve its performance or restore its HP or EN. Additionally, most stages contain hidden items or money on the map, which can be collected by moving a unit onto the items' locations. First to allow players to manually decide whether to counterattack during enemy turns. Debut of Shin Getter Robo. Series premiered: Tosshou Daimos, Super Bestial Machine God Dancougar, Dunbine OVA, Gundam Sentinel, Heavy Metal L-Gaim, Gundam Sentinel. Ported to Playstation as SRW4S. 4th Super Robot Wars Scramble: A remake of SRW4, featuring voice acting and CG movies for the first time.
